text: The Jacquard loom is a mechanical loom. It is used to make patterns in clothing material. It was invented by Joseph Marie Jacquard, and first used in 1801. It simplified the process of making textiles with complex patterns.Eric Hobsbawm, "The Age of Revolution", (London 1962; repr. 2008), p.45. ==References== Category:Machines Category:Manufacturing
title: Jacquard loom
